languages.text: "А теперь настал судьбоносный момент. Кто же из клейменных удостоится Высшей... милости..." {n}Запоздало осознав, что вы не принимали участия в прятках, губернатор косится на вас в нерешительности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А теперь настал судьбоносный момент. Кто же из клейменных удостоится... милости..." {n}Запоздало осознав, что вы не принимали участия в прятках, губернатор косится на вас в нерешительности.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А теперь настал судьбоносный момент. Кто же из клейменных удостоится Высшей... милости..." {n}Запоздало осознав, что вы не принимали участия в прятках, губернатор косится на вас в нерешительности.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you have missed the whole spectacle, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you have missed the whole spectacle, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

"And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

languages.text: “至于现在，决定命运的时刻到了。被打上印记的人群之中……有谁将会赢得至高恩惠……”{n}总督猛然意识到你根本没有参加这场狩猎，但为时已晚。他的声音越来越低，胆怯地瞥了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “至于现在，决定命运的时刻到了。被打上印记的人群之中……有谁将会赢得至高恩惠……”{n}总督猛然意识到你根本没有参加这场狩猎，但为时已晚。他的声音越来越低，胆怯地瞥了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: «Y ahora, ha llegado el momento de la verdad. ¿Quién de los marcados recibirá... el favor supremo...». {n}Habiéndose percatado demasiado tarde de que no has participado en la cacería, el gobernador enmudece y te mira apocado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora, ha llegado el momento de la verdad. ¿Quién de los marcados recibirá... el favor supremo...». {n}Habiéndose percatado demasiado tarde de que no has participado en la cacería, el gobernador enmudece y te mira apocado.{/n}

languages.text: "Kader anı geldi çattı. Damgalananlar arasından kime bu Yüce Lütuf bahşedilecek..." {n}Ava katılmadığını fark eden valinin sesi kısılıyor, çekinerek sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kader anı geldi çattı. Damgalananlar arasından kime bu Yüce Lütuf bahşedilecek..." {n}Ava katılmadığını fark eden valinin sesi kısılıyor, çekinerek sana bakıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「そして今、運命的な瞬間が訪れています。刻印を受けた者の中で…誰が…最高の恩恵を受けることになるのでしょうか…」{n}あなたはゲームに参加しなかったのことを気づくのが遅すぎて、総督の声は次第に小さくなり、臆病にあなたを見つめる{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして今、運命的な瞬間が訪れています。刻印を受けた者の中で…誰が…恩恵を受けることになるのでしょうか…」{n}気づくのが遅すぎて、あなたは全体の光景を見落とししていると、総督の声は次第に小さくなり、臆病にあなたを見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: « Le moment fatidique est enfin arrivé. Qui parmi les marqués... recevra la Faveur Ultime... » {n}Se rendant compte trop tard que vous n'avez pas participé à la chasse, le gouverneur s'interrompt et vous lance un regard timide.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le moment fatidique est enfin arrivé. Qui parmi les marqués... recevra la Faveur Ultime... » {n}Se rendant compte trop tard que vous n'avez pas participé à la chasse, le gouverneur s'interrompt et vous lance un regard timide.{/n}

languages.text: "Und nun ist der schicksalhafte Augenblick gekommen. Wer von den Gebrandmarkten erhält ... die höchste Gunst ..." {n}Der Gouverneur erkennt zu spät, dass du nicht an der Jagd teilgenommen hast. Er verstummt und sieht dich ängstlich an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And now, the fateful moment has arrived. Who among the branded will be granted... the Highest Favour..." {n}Having realised too late that you did not take part in the hunt, the governor trails off and glances at you timidly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und nun ist der schicksalhafte Augenblick gekommen. Wer von den Gebrandmarkten erhält ... die höchste Gunst ..." {n}Der Gouverneur erkennt zu spät, dass du nicht an der Jagd teilgenommen hast. Er verstummt und sieht dich ängstlich an.{/n}
